channel.title: Play Now Page Help
channel.description: Edit. Yes i did not phrase it correctly, i have webclient and all that im just looking for a nice looking html template page i can put webclient html code into. Such as a "template".

item.title: Play Now Page Help
item.dc:creator: @Xa1 Xa
item.description:
@Xa1 wrote:

If you’re still looking for a template shoot me a private message. I can do my best, and I can give you a template application so I can get a good idea on what you want.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Play Now Page Help
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

I have many free templates out there bud, I’m sure one would come in handy. I’m finishing up a new one at the moment so if you’d like to wait for that release you can. I’m not going to advertise where I have the templates because I feel that is in bad taste, I’m sure if you snoop around the web dev section you will find what I have released. Good luck!

Read full topic

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

If you wish to see what a webclient page looks like, download my Portal 2 template because I’ve included an example of a webclient page.

item.title: Play Now Page Help
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Back on topic please.

@Elven; please don’t post things like that. You did know what he was wanting and you could’ve helped him so he was perfectly in the right to call you out on it (just not on this thread). If you’re going to help, help. If you’re going to be a smart arse about it go elsewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Play Now Page Help
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“ReZGaming, post:4, topic:520171”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=638665.msg4305222#msg4305222 date=1369678059]
No. There is no webclient for specifically a PI server. There are only webclients for clients and PI is not a client, it is a server. Rephrase your question and I’ll help you.
[/quote]
LOL someone’s got a bug up there ass huh? Dude you wouldn’t help him even if he rephrased what he typed and you know it. You know what he wants and you know what he’s trying to type. Stop being a dick and actually help him. If not, come back when you don’t have a bee up your ass and don’t have an attitude. Thanks! (:
As for this…if you have a jar made up for your webclient page just search on google “Ric’s Webclient Tutorial” and take the webclient page off that.

P.S. 3lv3n snip3r…Don’t you even think to respond to this as you won’t get another answer. Once again you wouldn’t even help him if he did what you said so just stop acting like you know what you’re talking about. Thanks again! (:[/quote]
You obviously don’t know me and flaming at me will not help your cause. I would help him if he rephrases his question because, there is no such thing as a webclient for PI. So, basically, he’s asking for something that doesn’t exist. I’m not being a dick, I’m telling him the truth. Also, I do know what I’m talking about and, you don’t know me and what I’m capable of doing. If you really wish to test me about my knowledge about Java and HTML, please look up what I’ve done in the past. Before you come here talking shit about someone, do your loveing research first. Also, you really think making a webclient is that hard and that I’m not capable of doing that? I can jar and sign a client and have it uploaded and have the webclient working properly within a few minutes.

P.S. You’re obviously new to MoparScape and saying shit like that will start something. I’ve responded to your post, your move now.

Edit: If you still don’t think I’ll help people, check out how many posts I’ve made in the Server Help section compared to the rest of the sections. I do help people if they cooperate with me.

Read full topic
